topic.title: Google's new File Stream app causing problems
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 0.6.2
  * Operating system: Windows 10
  * Web browser: _Chrome
  * Tor status: Can't be loaded
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:
I recently installed the new Google File Stream app as they are discontinuing Google Drive app soon. Google File Stream completely blocks ZeroNet. If I quit the Google File Stream application then ZeroNet loads fine. I have tried this several times just to be sure. Google File Stream may be using the same localhost port as ZeroNet?

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. Run Google File Stream
  2. Then run ZeroNet
  3. Open browser and try to navigate to ZeroHello
  4. Page will not load

1604066522_mirrored_lothendriel_github.body: Not sure how to read the log
Would you like me to paste the entries from today here or is that not a safe thing to do?
Well, this is on my work computer. Not my personal one. Not sure what the unhandled exception might be
